description: Rakuten RMS enforces per-service request quotas. Limits are defined per service version and are lower than Amazon or eBay — design with batching and caching in mind.

searchOrder.note: Use dateTimeOrderFrom/To range filters to limit result set and avoid timeouts.

item_insert.note: Product creation is slow. Use batch imports for initial catalog load.

item_update.note: For bulk updates, use the CSV upload endpoint instead of individual item_update calls.

navigation_getGenreInformation.note: Cache genre data aggressively — category structure changes infrequently (monthly).

throttling_behavior.implementation_note: Rakuten can return 500 instead of 429 for throttled requests. Treat 500 errors with an 'over quota' error message as retryable throttling events, not fatal errors.

caching_recommendations: Cache genre (category) tree for 24 hours — it rarely changes.
Do not cache order data — orders must always be fetched fresh.
